text: Murray James Cook, AM (born 30 June 1960) is an Australian musician and actor. Cook was one of the first members of the children's band The Wiggles from 1991-2012. Cook played guitar and sang in the group. Cook also wrote songs for the group. == References == Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from New South Wales Category:Australian songwriters Category:Australian guitarists Category:Australian rock musicians Category:Rock guitarists Category:Order of Australia
title: Murray Cook
